home.title: Welcome to<1 />Whale Cafe!
home.description: All of your purchases aid charity causes.

currentOrderCard.name: Current Order
currentOrderCard.waiting_pickUp_one: Waiting for your drink, <1>~{{count}} minute remaining.</1>
currentOrderCard.waiting_pickUp_other: Waiting for your drink, <1>~{{count}} minutes remaining.</1>
currentOrderCard.done_delivery: Delivering your drink! <1>You will pay on delivery.</1>

order.notOpenDescription: Ordering is available starting at 10 a.m. daily.
order.quotaOnSiteDescription: Thank you for your patronage! Unfortunately, Whale Cafe's production capabilities are limited. There have been {{count}} cups ordered on-site today, which exceeds the quota of {{quota}}. You're welcome to order tomorrow.
order.quotaOnSiteRedirect: Thank you for your patronage! Unfortunately, Whale Cafe's production capabilities are limited. There have been {{count}} cups ordered on-site today, which exceeds the quota of {{quota}}. Online ordering is still available.
order.quotaOnlineDescription: Thank you for your patronage! Unfortunately, Whale Cafe's production capabilities are limited. There have been {{count}} cups ordered online today, which exceeds the quota of {{quota}}. You're welcome to order tomorrow.
order.quotaOnlineRedirect: Thank you for your patronage! Unfortunately, Whale Cafe's production capabilities are limited. There have been {{count}} cups ordered online today, which exceeds the quota of {{quota}}. On-site ordering is still available.

activeOrder.title: Active Order
activeOrder.description: Whale Cafe has a cause to support. All of your purchases aid charity causes. Please complete and pay for your previous order before making a new one.

confirm.title: Confirm Your Order
confirm.onSiteMatchFailed: Cannot find a user associated with this name. You will not be able to earn points with this purchase.
confirm.waitError: Failed to load wait time information.
confirm.waitLoading: You will be waiting for approximately ... minutes.
confirm.waitTime_one: You will be waiting for approximately {{count}} minute.
confirm.waitTime_other: You will be waiting for approximately {{count}} minutes.
confirm.payment: Please be ready to pay <1><2>in-person</2> after getting your drink.</1>

check.payQR: Pay in advance with WeChat Pay
check.payQRNote: Please make sure to note your order number when paying!

message.orderNumber: Please remember your order number, you will need it when picking up your drink.
message.pay: Please be ready to pay in-person.

check.done_pickUp: Ready for pick up! Remember to pay in-person.
check.done_delivery: Delivering your drink! You will pay on delivery.

login.title: Authorization
login.hint: Do you want to authorize <1>Whale</1> to use your following information?
login.privacy: SEIUE is a product operated by Beijing Yuehuo Education Technology Limited. By continuing to log in, you indicate your agreement to SEIUE's terms and conditions.

permissions.name: Whale will receive your real name.
permissions.eduId: Whale will receive your SEIUE user ID.
permissions.phone: Whale will receive your phone number, if available.
permissions.noPassword: Whale will not be able to receive your password.

onboarding.error: An error occurred while logging in, please try again.
onboarding.welcomeMessage: You have successfully logged in as {{name}} and may enjoy all that Whale Cafe has to offer.

account.userGratification: Thank you for being with Whale Cafe!
account.administrationMobile: Administration features are not available on small screens. Please use a larger screen to access these features.
account.pointsMessage: Points are earned through purchases and can be used to redeem rewards.
account.privacyHint: Your information is retrieved from SEIUE, a product operated by Beijing Yuehuo Education Technology Limited. Whale Cafe cannot access your SEIUE account credentials, and only retrieves basic information about your account. Your information is stored safely and is not shared with third-parties. You may erase your information under certain conditions.

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Account Deletion
deleteConfirm.description: Are you sure that you want to delete your account? All of your data will be erased. This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirm.unavailable: Your account cannot be deleted because you have unfinished orders.

account.credits: Project Whale is built by Team WebArtistry with support of Whale Cafe. Thank you to all of our contributors. Project Whale is <1>open source</1>.

manage.title: Whale Cafe: Process Orders
manage.unselected: Select an order to get started

blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description: There is an issue with your account. Please contact support.

a11y.testing: TESTING MODE: YOUR ORDERS WILL NOT BE PROCESSED OR SAVED. SOME FEATURES MAY NOT WORK.
